howToContribute.title: How to contribute?
howToContribute.desc: Thank you for thinking to contribute to NEAR in Minutes ðŸš€. If you are wondering how the contribution process works. Check this quickstart guide that will help you get starting in no time.

contributionInstruction.subTitle: How to fill form/issue
contributionInstruction.stepOne: Go to the issues section in
contributionInstruction.stepTwo: Click on a  New issue and choose the type of content you would like to contribute.
contributionInstruction.stepThree: Choose how you want to contribute and fill in the information accordingly.
contributionInstruction.seeExample: If you like to see an example of a submitted issue
contributionInstruction.learnMore: If you want to get more information on how to make a good video
contributionInstruction.types: Currently we have three types of contribution:
contributionInstruction.newContentDesc: if you have a video in mind you would like to create and add to the collection of videos.
contributionInstruction.newTopicDesc: if you would like to translate the content to another language. Currently we support Turkish and Hindi.
contributionInstruction.translateDesc: if you have a topic in mind and you would like to suggest so someone else can make a tutorial about it.

setupSystemInstruction.title: How to setup your system
setupSystemInstruction.stepOne: Divide you screen according to topic of to tutorial and place your documents page, terminal, code editor and tools on your screen
setupSystemInstruction.stepTwo: Show your sytem info, tool versions and date on the divided terminal pane
setupSystemInstruction.stepthree: Open loom app and be sure your recording settings are set

makeVideoInstruction.title: How to make a video
makeVideoInstruction.stepTwo: Click on the 'Get Loom for Free' and sign up
makeVideoInstruction.stepThree: Click on the avatar at top right corner of the side and choose your download method.
makeVideoInstruction.stepFour: When you are ready to record, click on `Start Recording`
